Acceptance Criteria - AS 1725.1, AS 3679.1, All steel items shall be hot dip galvanised in accordance with AS 4680.
Relevant Documents: Controlling Procedure/ Specification / Standard / Drawings - OPS-QLDS-CI-SPE-003 REV 0: Section 3.3

Acceptance Criteria - Holes shall be a minimum of 250mm in diameter and 900mm deep, protude heights for strainer & coners posts shall be 1300mm, for stay blocks 300mm, for star pickets 1250mm, nominal depth for star pickets 550mm, Spacing between any 2 posts shall not be less than 3m or greater than 5m.
Relevant Documents: Controlling Procedure/ Specification / Standard / Drawings - OPS-QLDS-CI-SPE-003 REV 0: Section 3.3
Acceptance Criteria - Posts and stay blocks shall have concrete around the base to a minimum height of 50mm above ground level, concrete 25MPa
Relevant Documents: Controlling Procedure/ Specification / Standard / Drawings - OPS-QLDS-CI-SPE-003 REV 0: Section 3.3
Acceptance Criteria - Stays shall be fully welded to posts and stay blocks, Gate hinges shall be fully welded to gates and posts, Welded joints to be coated with a zinc rich coating.
